common.search: Search by name, description or URL...
common.name: Name

auth.logoutSuccess: See you later! Come back soon
auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Redirecting to login...
auth.twoFactorInfo: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app

dashboard.title: Coolify Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage your applications, services, and databases

modals.redirecting: You will be redirected to the page
modals.redirectToNewTab: You will be redirected to the following address in a new tab:

tooltips.internalConnection: You can use this address in your other services to connect to this database.
tooltips.externalConnection: You can use this address to connect to this database from outside your infrastructure.
tooltips.backupWarning: It is recommended to configure backup to prevent data loss.

settings.title: Settings
settings.twoFactorAuthDescription: Manage your 2FA settings and regenerate QR codes
settings.regenerateSuccess: 2FA regenerated successfully! Scan the new QR code.
settings.regenerateWarning: This will invalidate your current 2FA codes. Make sure to scan the new QR code immediately.
settings.oldCodesInvalid: Your old 2FA codes will stop working immediately
settings.newQRGenerated: A new QR code will be generated
settings.mustUpdateApp: You MUST update your authenticator app with the new QR code
settings.howToUpdate: How to update your authenticator app:
settings.step1: Enter your current password and 2FA code below
settings.step2: Scan the new QR code with your authenticator app
settings.step3: Enter the new 6-digit code to verify and complete the setup
settings.confirmRegenerate: Are you sure you want to regenerate your 2FA secret?
settings.qrCodeInstructions: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
settings.qrCodeGenerated: New QR code generated! Please scan it and verify with a new code.
settings.qrGeneratedDescription: Your old 2FA codes are now invalid. Please scan the new QR code below and verify with a new 6-digit code to complete the setup.
settings.verifyNewCodeDescription: Scan the QR code above with your authenticator app, then enter the new 6-digit code to complete the setup.
settings.verificationSuccess: 2FA setup completed successfully! Your new code is now active.
settings.verificationFailed: Verification failed. Please check your code and try again.
settings.verificationFailedWithAttempts: Invalid code. Attempt {{attempts}}/{{maxAttempts}}. Please try again.
settings.tooManyVerificationAttempts: Too many failed attempts. Restarting the setup process...
settings.verificationAttemptInfo: Make sure you scanned the QR code correctly
settings.setupCompleteDescription: Your 2FA has been successfully updated. You can now use the new code to log in.
settings.changePasswordNote: To change your username or password, contact your system administrator or manually update the .env file
